## Vapor pressure

$e$ denotes vapor pressure, $E$ saturation vapor pressure.

## Humidity

Various measures exist for humidity, e.g.

##### specific humidity

$$
q = \frac{m_{water \ vapor}}{m}
$$

##### relative humidity

$$
\frac{e}{E}
$$

## Relationship to heat

Specific heat is different depending on whether air is dry or contains water vapor.

$$
\frac{c_p\ vapor}{c_p \ dry} = 1.87
$$

$$
\frac{c_v\ vapor}{c_v \ dry} = 1.92
$$
